song.title: Countdown to Death
song.info:
From [url=http://www.mazedude.com/aa/]The American Album[/url]
Track # 10 from my epic "American Album" remix project. Another experimental track, the goal here was to construct every sound from what was originally a string instrument. So we have some pure pizzicato, plucked violin and cello and all that, but we also have heavily distorted standing bass, manipulated double-fifths, and oodles of other madness. I stayed true to the concept - even in the industrial final phase, every sound in here was created from strings.
